title: DEVELOPMENT.md references missing npm script type-check
why_it_matters: DEVELOPMENT.md instructs contributors to run npm run type-check, but type-check is not defined in package.json. This breaks onboarding and standard QA workflows.
evidence: Line 848: 'Check TypeScript errors: npm run type-check'
Line 986: '[ ] Type check passes (npm run type-check)'
package.json scripts do not include 'type-check' (validated via scripts/check-content-accuracy.js)

steps: Either add a type-check script to package.json (e.g., tsc --noEmit) OR update documentation to reference the existing equivalent command.
Re-run docs accuracy tooling to confirm it passes.

title: AUDIT_TRACKER.md references missing npm script review:reset
why_it_matters: AUDIT_TRACKER.md documents a script (npm run review:reset) that does not exist in package.json, which blocks the documented audit workflow.
evidence: Line 208: 'npm run review:reset -- --category=code --type=single'
package.json scripts do not include 'review:reset' (validated via scripts/check-content-accuracy.js)

steps: Update AUDIT_TRACKER.md to reference the correct existing script (if renamed), or implement review:reset in package.json.

title: DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md contains broken links to missing src/dataconnect-generated docs
why_it_matters: DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md links to generated documentation paths under src/dataconnect-generated/... that do not exist in the repository. This makes the main index misleading and creates dead navigation.
evidence: Line 464: link to src/dataconnect-generated/README.md (file missing)
Line 472: link to src/dataconnect-generated/.guides/usage.md (file missing)
Line 473: link to src/dataconnect-generated/.guides/setup.md (file missing)
Line 481: link to src/dataconnect-generated/react/README.md (file missing)
Confirmed: no src/ directory exists in repo root

steps: Remove these entries from DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md OR update them to correct existing location.

title: Multi-AI documentation audit template contains invalid external URL placeholder
why_it_matters: A literal https:// appears as a URL placeholder, which is not a valid URL. Automated link checks will flag this.
evidence: Line 323: https:// (invalid URL token; validated by URL parse check)

steps: Replace https:// with a valid example URL or wrap in backticks as placeholder.

title: audit-documentation skill doc contains invalid external URL placeholders
why_it_matters: The audit-documentation SKILL.md includes literal https:// placeholders which are invalid URLs.
evidence: Line 125: https:// (invalid URL token)
Line 132: https:// (invalid URL token)

steps: Replace placeholders with https://example.com/... or keep in code formatting with explicit 'placeholder' labeling.

title: Evaluation report missing required Tier 2 sections and has invalid Last Updated metadata
why_it_matters: This Tier 2 evaluation report is missing required sections (Purpose/Overview/Scope, Version History) and has invalid Last Updated value.
evidence: Missing required section matching /purpose|overview|scope/i
Missing required section matching /version history/i
Invalid 'Last Updated' date: Invalid date format

steps: Add required Tier 2 headers per docs/DOCUMENTATION_STANDARDS.md.
Fix metadata so Last Updated is a valid ISO date (YYYY-MM-DD).

title: Evaluation report missing required Tier 2 sections
why_it_matters: This Tier 2 evaluation report is missing required sections (Purpose/Overview/Scope, Version History).
evidence: Missing required section matching /purpose|overview|scope/i
Missing required section matching /version history/i

steps: Add required Tier 2 sections per docs/DOCUMENTATION_STANDARDS.md.

title: Multi-AI audit evaluation report missing required Tier 2 sections and has invalid Last Updated
why_it_matters: This Tier 2 evaluation report is missing required sections and has invalid metadata parsing for Last Updated.
evidence: Missing required section matching /purpose|overview|scope/i
Missing required section matching /version history/i
Invalid 'Last Updated' date: Invalid date format

steps: Add required Tier 2 sections and valid Version History.
Fix metadata so Last Updated is valid ISO date.

title: ROADMAP.md metadata parsing fails for Last Updated and Status section missing
why_it_matters: ROADMAP.md has invalid Last Updated date (parsing a session string) and missing recommended Status section. Weakens Tier 1 canonical doc compliance.
evidence: Invalid 'Last Updated' date: 'Session #128'
Missing recommended section matching /status/i

steps: Normalize ROADMAP.md metadata to include explicit Last Updated: YYYY-MM-DD.
Add/rename a Status section or adjust checker config.

title: Plan doc LIGHTHOUSE_INTEGRATION_PLAN.md in wrong location
why_it_matters: A plan document lives at docs/ root but placement rules require plan docs under docs/plans/.
evidence: Placement checker: 'Plan file in wrong location' for docs/LIGHTHOUSE_INTEGRATION_PLAN.md

steps: Move docs/LIGHTHOUSE_INTEGRATION_PLAN.md to docs/plans/LIGHTHOUSE_INTEGRATION_PLAN.md.
Update inbound links.

title: TESTING_PLAN.md flagged as misplaced and temporary file
why_it_matters: TESTING_PLAN.md flagged as (1) plan doc in wrong location and (2) temporary file name per lifecycle rules.
evidence: Placement checker: 'Plan file in wrong location' for docs/TESTING_PLAN.md
Cleanup checker: 'Temporary file detected'

steps: If active plan: move to docs/plans/ and rename to canonical name.
If superseded: move to docs/archive/.

title: decisions/TEMPLATE.md misplaced and treated as temporary file
why_it_matters: Template file under docs/decisions/ but placement rules require templates under docs/templates/. Also flagged as temporary.
evidence: Placement checker: 'Template file in wrong location'
Cleanup checker: 'Temporary file detected'

steps: Move docs/decisions/TEMPLATE.md to docs/templates/DECISION_TEMPLATE.md.
Update any references.

title: Multi-AI audit plan templates misplaced (should be in docs/plans/)
why_it_matters: Plan templates under docs/multi-ai-audit/templates/ flagged by placement rules as being in wrong location.
evidence: Placement checker flags each file as 'Plan file in wrong location'

steps: Either move to docs/plans/ or reclassify as templates and update placement rules.
Update references in documentation and generator scripts.

title: AI_WORKFLOW.md contains code blocks without language tags
why_it_matters: AI_WORKFLOW.md contains multiple fenced code blocks with no language identifier.
evidence: Line 57: code fence without language tag
Line 383: code fence without language tag
Line 415: code fence without language tag
Line 474: code fence without language tag
Line 498: code fence without language tag
Line 628: code fence without language tag

steps: Add explicit language tag to each fenced block (bash, json, ts, text).

title: External URL check failures likely environment/network artifacts
why_it_matters: SUSPECTED: External link checking produced ECONNREFUSED/ETIMEDOUT for well-known URLs. Environment cannot reliably reach public internet so failures cannot be confirmed.
evidence: node scripts/check-external-links.js reports ECONNREFUSED/ETIMEDOUT for common domains

steps: Re-run npm run docs:external-links in normal dev environment with network access.
verification: npm run docs:external-links (in CI/local with network)

title: Markdownlint and Prettier checks not confirmed
why_it_matters: SUSPECTED: npm run docs:lint and format:check were not executed. Additional format issues may exist beyond Node-based doc scripts.
evidence: package.json includes docs:lint and format:check but only Node-based scripts were used

steps: Run npm run docs:lint and npm run format:check -- docs/ in CI/local.
